product_name: Arc'teryx Atom SV Hoodie Jacket - Women's
long_description: The insulated women's Atom SV Hoodie jacket is breathable enough to be used as a super warm mid-layer on frigid days and protective enough to be an outer layer while belaying or hanging out at camp. Warm, resilient Coreloft(TM) insulates but still packs up small and light. Light tricot underarm panel enhances breathability. Outer fabric is moisture- and wind-resistant; Durable Water Repellent treatment causes water and snow to bead up from fabric surface. Insulated scuba-style hood adds warmth. Full-length front zipper with interior wind flap. Stretch-knit cuffs are extra comfortable and hold in warmth. Zippered hand pockets and an internal zippered chest pocket; adjustable hem drawcord. Articulated elbows and gusseted underarms ensure you are comfortable in the Arc'teryx Atom SV Hoodie.
short_description: The insulated women's Atom SV Hoodie jacket is breathable enough to be used as a super warm mid-layer on frigid days and protective enough to be an outer layer while belaying or hanging out at camp.
